> Powered by [Codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/willmcgugan/rich/pull/260?src=pr&el=footer). Last update [38b11c8...996f775](https://codecov.io/gh/willmcgugan/rich/pull/260?src=pr&el=lastupdated). Read the [comment docs](https://docs.codecov.io/docs/pull-request-comments).

I don't think this a good idea. I wouldn't want to presume how the application developer would like to configure their environment. It would also effect all Console instances, which might not be desirable.

If you do need it, it's a straightforward thing to implement as required.
Makes sense. I was thinking this would standardize the behavior with `TERM` environment variable, but this does have much more of an effect on output.
